User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the ConnectApp.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user, typically the Firebase Auth UID.

name.description: The full name of the user.

Connection.title: Connection
Connection.description: Represents a connection request between two users.

userIds.description: Array containing the UIDs of both users in the connection.

requesterId.description: The UID of the user who sent the request.

receiverId.description: The UID of the user who received the request.

status.description: The status of the connection request.

/connections/{connectionId}.description: Tracks connection requests and acceptances between users.
